body_html:
distutils might also be a red herring, I've built this on windows 10 and got exactly the same errors (although I did download pthreads.h...).

Set additional paths for the include files when building
-DPYTHON_INCLUDE_DIR=<PATH_TO_INCLUDE_IN_ANACONDA>

If I remember correctly, you may have to add more that just this (numpy as well I think, -DNUMPY_INCLUDE_DIR), I can't remember exactly what I ended up with.
